messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Compile the campus shootings in the United States from 2010 to 2024 (including 2024). The information to be compiled includes the date of the incident (in the format of yyyy/mm/dd), the state where it occurred, the location (school), the name of the shooter, the identity of the shooter, the age of the shooter (at the time of the incident, if you can't find the exact number, output "Not Provided"), the outcome of the shooter, and the number of deaths( The statistics should include only shootings with a death toll greater than 0, excluding the death of the shooter).

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table.
Incident Date, State, Location (School), Shooter, Identity, Age of Shooter, Outcome, Death Toll

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
To start answering this question, I need to gather information on all the campus shootings that have happened in the U.S. from 2010 to 2024. I'll begin my search.
</think>
<search>campus shootings in the United States from 2010 to 2024</search>

Search query: campus shootings in the United States from 2010 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:University_and_college_shootings_in_the_United_States):
Category:University and college shootings in the United States Shootings at colleges or universities in the United States, whether or not anyone was killed or injured.

[Doc 2](https://www.bestcolleges.com/research/college-shootings-statistics/):
Shootings at Colleges: U.S. Statistics | BestColleges There have been 17 mass shootings at U.S. colleges involving three or more fatalities. Our report covers college shootings and gun violence on college ...

[Doc 3](https://www.facebook.com/wbkotv/posts/here-is-a-list-of-deadly-shootings-on-college-campuses-in-the-ushttpsshorturlatw/1320393483463386/):
Here is a list of deadly shootings on college campuses in the US ... Well as Charlie Kirk said before being shot "owning my gun is worth a few sacrifices" he was talking about school shooting victims by the ...

Search query: specific campus shootings from 2010 to 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.bestcolleges.com/research/college-shootings-statistics/):
Shootings at Colleges: U.S. Statistics | BestColleges There have been 17 mass shootings at U.S. colleges involving three or more fatalities. Our report covers college shootings and gun violence on college ...

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:University_and_college_shootings_in_the_United_States):
Category:University and college shootings in the United States Shootings at colleges or universities in the United States, whether or not anyone was killed or injured.

[Doc 3](https://www.cnn.com/us/school-shootings-fast-facts-dg):
School shootings in the US: Fast facts - CNN In the first year of the pandemic, when schools were closed, there was a major decline in gun violence incidents on school grounds. Since then, ...

Based on these sources, I will manually compile the data for campus shootings in the specified years. Let's look up each specific incident:

1. Sandy Hook Elementary School Shooting
2. Virginia Tech Shooting
3. Umpqua Community College Shooting
4. Southern University at New Orleans Shooting
5. Santa Fe High School Shooting
6. Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School Shooting
7. Northern Arizona University Shooting
8. Oxford High School Shooting
9. Buffalo High School Shooting
10. STEM High School Shooting

12. University of Texas Rio Grande Valley Shooting

14. University of California, Santa Barbara Shooting
15. University of Texas at El Paso Shooting
16. University of California, Merced Shooting
17. University of Colorado Boulder Shooting

Let's collect the data for these shootings:
</think>
<search>Sandy Hook Elementary School Shooting details 2010-2024</search>

Search query: Sandy Hook Elementary School Shooting details 2010-2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandy_Hook_Elementary_School_shooting):
Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting - Wikipedia The perpetrator, 20-year-old Adam Lanza, shot and killed 26 people. The victims were 20 children between six and seven years old, and six adult staff members.

[Doc 2](https://www.britannica.com/event/Sandy-Hook-Elementary-School-shooting):
Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting | Facts & Timeline Adam Lanza fatally shot 20 children and 6 adults at Sandy Hook Elementary School before taking his own life. It was one of the deadliest school shootings in US ...

[Doc 3](https://www.sandyhookpromise.org/about-us/our-history/):
Our History - Sandy Hook Promise Twenty first-graders and six educators are killed at Sandy Hook Elementary School by 154 bullets fired in less than five minutes. Affected families begin ...
